summary: cellar, apiary, bigger bedroom,pictures,new light sources for breezehome.needs hearthfire
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an expansion of my first breezehome mod.
additional to the basement I created in(+ around ) the House some new things .
changes :
!!!The mod requires Hearthfires Dlc,firstly because i used a few things like eg apiary butterchurn from it ,
secondly because I rearranged the bookshelf + alchemy table moved by Hearthfire ( in other parts of the house.)
!! I.e. you should before installing this mod,buy from vogt in Dragonsreach all house facilities as well as the Childrens room,
so there are no problems.


- The huscarl room is now Alchemniezimmer.bookshelf is in the basement .

- The basement has enchantment table , forge, grindstone , oven , one double bed secret treasure room..

- The upper floor of the house is now fully accessible through expansion of the bedroom to the detriment of the right mindless alcove above the door .

- There are some new images and light sources in the house

- many new little things ... see pictures ..!

- Outside the house there are also small changes hpts. apiary, shrubs , bird nests ect. ,
i.e. the mods that change the outside area of breeze home , possibly making problems.

!!!i strongly recommend to make a savegame before install!
     possible to loose inventory in Bookshelfs or weaponracks 


This is only a small mod, which contains the cozy atmosphere of cozy breeze home ,
but also to give the house a little more space and depth.

Have Fun,
ladida
author: ladida
